players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. Diana was killed last night, and my investigation revealed Alice as the mafioso."
You: "I didn't kill Diana! Bob is just trying to frame me as the mafioso to deflect suspicion."
You: "Bob's just making up stories to save himself. We should vote him out instead!"

Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. My investigation confirmed it. She's trying to turn this around on me, but her desperation is clear. Diana was killed, and Alice is the only one who benefits from her death and wants me silenced."
